title: New York Times sues Perplexity for copyright infringement with AI
description: The New York Times has filed suit against artificial intelligence startup Perplexity for copyright infringement.
content:
Dec. 5 (UPI) -- The New York Times has filed suit against artificial intelligence startup Perplexity for copyright infringement.

title: Real or fake? Researchers to develop tool that would help courts spot AI evidence
description: TORONTO — As artificial intelligence makes it easier for anyone to doctor – or even fabricate – videos, photos and other types of evidence, a group of researchers in Canada is aiming to help the courts sort through what’s real or fake.
content:

title: AI wearable company Limitless says it has been acquired by Meta
description: Meta has acquired the startup Limitless, which makes a which makes a small, artificial intelligence-powered pendant.
content:
Artificial intelligence wearable startup Limitless said Friday that it has been acquired by Meta .
Limitless makes a small, AI-powered pendant that can do tasks like recording conversations and generating summaries.
Limitless CEO Dan Siroker revealed... [450 chars]

title: 'AI will not shape judicial decisions': SC
description: India's Supreme Court judges are exercising extreme caution with artificial intelligence. They have stated that AI will not be allowed to dictate judicial decisions. The court acknowledged concerns about AI citing non-existent case laws. Judges will cross-check AI outputs. This awareness is part of judicial training. The bar and judges will adapt over time.
content:
